20110113161331.000|20110113161332.000|CC1|COMMON, VERY BAD TOGETHER.      
20110113161332.000|20110113161334.000|CC1|SO YOU ANT TO MAKE SURE YOU     
20110113161334.000|20110113161336.000|CC1|CLEAN OUT THAT HUMIDIFIER AND   
20110113161336.000|20110113161338.000|CC1|CHANGE THE WATER.               
20110113161338.000|20110113161341.000|CC1|PETS, DON'T BRING THEM IN YOUR  
20110113161341.000|20110113161342.000|CC1|BEDROOM.                        
20110113161342.000|20110113161343.000|CC1|>> AND VACUUM REGULARLY.        
20110113161343.000|20110113161344.000|CC1|ASHLEY TWEETS IN, ASKING IF YOU 
20110113161344.000|20110113161347.000|CC1|NEED A MULTI-VITAMIN EVERY DAY. 
20110113161347.000|20110113161349.000|CC1|>> INCREDIBLY COMMON QUESTION.  
20110113161349.000|20110113161351.000|CC1|IF YOU'RE NOT SUFFERING FROM A  
20110113161351.000|20110113161353.000|CC1|CHRONIC ILLNESS OR STREAK VEGAN 
20110113161353.000|20110113161356.000|CC1|OR VEGETARIAN MOST PEOPLE DO NOT
20110113161356.000|20110113161357.000|CC1|NEED IT WITH THE EXCEPTION OF   
20110113161357.000|20110113161401.000|CC1|VITAMIN D AND CALCIUM AND OMEGA 
20110113161401.000|20110113161401.000|CC1|OILS.                           
20110113161401.000|20110113161402.000|CC1|CHECK WITH YOUR DOCTOR BUT MOST 
20110113161402.000|20110113161404.000|CC1|PEOPLE LIKE TO TAKE MULTIS BUT  
20110113161404.000|20110113161405.000|CC1|THEY'RE NOT GOING TO CATAPULT   
20110113161405.000|20110113161407.000|CC1|YOUR HEALTH TO A DIFFERENT
